info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:15PM MDT until July 08 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PONDERA AND SOUTHEASTERN TOOLE COUNTIES... At 515 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southeast of Shelby, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Devon, Dunkirk, Galata and Ledger. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
